text: Fashion is indeed a game of hit and miss. While some experiments lead up to memorable hits, some end up as miserable fails. You'll realize the intensity of the gamble when big names like Hiedi Klum and Lupita Nyong'o fell prey to miserable fashion fails. And which better way to record these epic moments than on the red carpets of grand ceremonies and awards. Here are some of the worst red carpet fashion failures that made us go WTF!
